explanation: Multiple participants expressed negative short-term sentiment on BTC, mentioning it may bleed a bit more and referencing a 'big dum after mini bull run.' Some are waiting for further drops before acting, and there's no strong bullish counterpoint for BTC in this set of opinions. No direct buy signals were spotted, and most positive market commentary was about other coins or off-topic.
representative_opinions: Was N 1: so close to short Target on Alt scalp. BTC just bleed a little more and then do what you like
Dd: Its time for the big dum after mini bull run
Was N 1: come btc drop a bit more
